meanings.definition: The act of making something more dandy or stylish.
meanings.sent1: She added some dandifications to her outfit with a colorful scarf.
meanings.sent2: The dandifications on the car's interior made it look luxurious.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at dandifications with mismatched socks was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The artist's dandifications on the canvas transformed it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The dandifications on the plain dress turned it into a glamorous gown.

meanings.definition: The process of improving or enhancing the appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: The dandifications of the garden included adding colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: Regular cleaning and maintenance are essential for the dandifications of the house.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret ingredient was the key to the dandifications of the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the best dandifications to brighten up the room.
meanings.sent5: The dandifications of the old building brought new life to the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: The state of being fashionable or well-dressed.
meanings.sent1: His dandifications always caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: She exuded confidence with her impeccable dandifications.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt at dandifications with a bow tie was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her dandifications were like a beacon of style in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The fashion show displayed the latest dandifications in clothing.
